version_description: ◉ Some critical bugs have been smashed, so you can enjoy a smooth experience and fast performance
◉ Some critical bugs have been smashed, so you can enjoy a smooth experience and fast performance
◉ Some bugs have been fixed. Enjoy a smooth experience and fast performance!
◉ Some bugs have been fixed. Enjoy a smooth experience and fast performance!

Hi guys!
We are happy to introduce a couple of new features with this version:

◉ RANDOM WORDS GENERATOR
With this tool you get a versatile list of words for training, 5 to 100 per practice. Ready for the challenge?

◉ STATISTICS
Introducing statistics to help in tracking the learning progress while you achieve greater levels. Stay motivated!

Enjoy!
◉ Some bugs have been fixed. Enjoy a smooth experience and fast performance!

◉ Support for IOS 12 was added
◉ Some bugs have been fixed. Enjoy a smooth experience and fast performance!

We update the Remember app as often as possible to make it more reliable, fast and cool!

In this update:
- UI has become even nicer and more responsive
- Bug fixes

Love the app? Write a review to help others discover Remember.

***HOT FIX***
Sorry you had this terrible issue, when you couldn't exit practice mode. Now it's been fixed. Please enjoy smooth experience.

NEW PRONUNCIATIONS
We're proud to announce we bring brand new native pronunciations for number of languages:
◉ English (British)
◉ Spanish
◉ Italian
◉ German
◉ Dutch
◉ French
◉ Japanese
◉ Korean
◉ Sweden
◉ Turkish

If you like an update, please let us know by leaving a review in App Store. Thanks!
Remember gets better with time! Update to the latest version to get the best experience.

Remember gets better with time! In this version, we added Spanish interface!

Love the app? Rate us!
And don't forget to let us know your thoughts, we love receiving feedback from you <3

Remember gets better for you! In this version we have improved card sets, so now you can practice as many words as you want!

NEW IN THIS VERSION
• Added 15 languages: Hungarian, Vietnamese, Hebrew, Hindi, Latin, Azerbaijani, Croatian, Filipino, Indonesian, Kazakh, Romanian, Serbian, Tajik, Thai and Uzbek
• Now you can add an example to the translation
• Recently used languages in translator
• Fixed some bugs. Enjoy smooth experience and fast performance!

Love the app? Rate us! <3

NEW IN THIS VERSION
• Portuguese localisation
• Fixed the issue with articles in French
• Now you are able to add multiple translations for one word. Add a word -> change translation -> add the same word
• Filter practising by the language you're learning
• Edit translation by swiping card to the left

Thanks for all the feedback you share with us. We hear you! New in this version:

Core:
- iPad support
- Filter. Find and filter words you need
- Sort. Sort words by name or chronologically
- Listen. Massively improved pronunciations for the majority of languages
- See last used languages

Bugs:
- Fixed annoying bug with cross pronunciation in the training
- Fixed auto pronunciation, now works with silent mode. To control it, please check settings in the app

Love the app? Rate us <3
annoying notifications bug was fixed

NEW IN THIS VERSION
• All card sets now support all the languages from the app. Keep an eye on those — we start adding them regularly ;) Send us your recommendations in a letter marked “Card Sets” at hello@rmmbr.io
• Improved speech recognition technology, enjoy the accuracy
• Improved Speaking practice mode. Now you're able to try unlimited amount of times before your answer is submitted

BUGS:
• Stability improvements
• Fixed bug where after reinstall you would see trial page even if it was already used

NEW IN THIS VERSION
• All card sets now support all the languages from the app. Keep an eye on those — we start adding them regularly ;) Send us your recommendations in a letter marked “Card Sets” at hello@rmmbr.io
• Improved speech recognition technology, enjoy the accuracy
• Improved Speaking practice mode. Now you're able to try unlimited amount of times before your answer is submitted

BUGS:
• Stability improvements
• Fixed bug where after reinstall you would see trial page even if it was already used

NEW IN THIS VERSION:
• Dark mode — you asked, we listen. Enjoy!
• Unlimited amount of words per group in practice
• Get Lifetime at any time through settings
• Take notifications under control. Set type and time as you wish.
• Settings are now more organised

BUGS:
• Sometimes notifications were incorrect. We fixed those
• Some bugs which caused crashes have been fixed. Please keep reporting.

NEW IN THIS VERSION:
Synchronization — months and months of hard work. And finally we’ve done this! Registration is now available for everyone. Save your words, use Remember on multiple devices and sync progress between them! We feel so excited about this, please send us your feedback.
• Some bugs which caused crashes have been fixed. Please keep reporting
• Training animation bug was fixed

NEW IN THIS VERSION:

• Words import — import your personal list of words using spreadsheets!
• Some UI bugs were fixed

NEW IN THIS VERSION:

Meet new first tab!
• Practice words in multiple groups at the same time
• Choose types and sequence of practice
• Memorize faster with new redesigned practice logic
• Sort your groups and card sets
• Repeat learned words

NEW IN THIS VERSION:

• Words usage examples
• Improved answer options in practice mode
• Bugfixes

NEW IN THIS VERSION:

• fixed a nasty bug that caused the text in the cards on the iPad to be cropped

NEW IN THIS VERSION:

• bugfixes
